books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Detective Michael Bennett and the F.B.I.’s Emily Parker must save New York City from a deadly threat.
books.name: ALERT

books.author: by Harper Lee
books.description: In the mid-1950s, a grown-up Jean Louise Finch returns to Maycomb and realizes that her adored father is a racist.
books.name: GO SET A WATCHMAN

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A sequel told from Christian's point of view.
books.name: GREY

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II; the winner of the 2015 Pulitzer Prize.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Ilona Andrews
books.description: In the eighth Kate Daniels novel, Kate and Curran, who have broken with the Pack, investigate a friend’s disappearance.
books.name: MAGIC SHIFTS

books.author: by Sherrilyn Kenyon
books.description: In the 26th Dark-Hunter novel, ancient enemies battle in modern-day New Orleans.
books.name: DRAGONBANE

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Jessica Knoll
books.description: The life of a successful magazine writer is shaken when secrets from her past are revealed in a documentary.
books.name: LUCKIEST GIRL ALIVE

books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: The counterterrorism operative Scot Harvath undertakes a deadly assignment set in motion by a leaked video.
books.name: CODE OF CONDUCT

books.author: by Paula McLain
books.description: A novel by the author of “The Paris Wife” about Beryl Markham, a horse trainer and aviatrix raised in Kenya.
books.name: CIRCLING THE SUN

books.author: by Christine Feehan, Maggie Shayne and Lori Herter
books.description: An anthology of vampire romance roves through the Carpathians and Anasazi ruins in its pursuit of sanguine desire.
books.name: EDGE OF DARKNESS

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman who was spared when her mother and sisters were murdered begins to reinvestigate the case against her imprisoned brother.
books.name: DARK PLACES

books.author: by W. E. B. Griffin and William E. Butterworth IV
books.description: The Philadelphia homicide detective Matt Payne looks for a pattern in a series of murders; a Badge of Honor novel.
books.name: DEADLY ASSETS
